column1: The Purple Pig////This is a modern
column2: happening tapas (small plates) restaurant with a bar
column4: and open kitchen. The restaurant isn't huge
column5: but it's not tiny either. It's popular - at the time of writing this review
column7: 581 reviews (!) - and it was packed during our Sunday afternoon visit around 1pm. They *do not* take reservations. It's first come
column8: first served. We were lucky and were seated immediately at one of the communal high-tops near the kitchen.
